Reviews.Title: My daughter LOVES this phone!
Reviews.Author: Ftlaudgirl "Karen"
Reviews.Content: Bought this phone for my 17 year old daughter as a Christmas present. She absolutely loves this phone. She's a HUGE texting princess and she finds it very easy to use.The querty board is what we love on our phones, and the option to use it as a regular cell phone, or slide it to open up the querty board is a bonus to this phone.The phone also has the data capability, but we just use it as a regular phone. We've tried touch screens, but they need to be recalibrated once a year, and they are not as nearly easy to use. We like the feel of the buttons of the querty board!

Reviews.Title: My son and I love this phone.
Reviews.Author: J. McGuinnes
Reviews.Content: If you like to text this phone is easy to use and perfect for texting. My 11 year son and I each have one and we really like them. They hold a charge for a long time and get very good reception in most locations. It takes decent pictures but not for printing just sharing.

Reviews.Title: it's effective.
Reviews.Author: bzbrat
Reviews.Content: I had purchased this because my last phone was a gravity 2 and although I am not in love with it, it does the two main things I need it to do. This phone seems to have a very poor battery and there is a lot of echoing feedback when I talk on it. So, as stated before, I was not in love with my first gravity two, but after looking at a lot of expensive over the top phones that are out now, this seemed to be the more logical choice for me.

Reviews.Title: Needed a new phone
Reviews.Author: shirley morales
Reviews.Content: Very nice phone My son loved it , has a very long battery life, easy to use option to use the slider or the front keyboard which is great!

Reviews.Title: ZERO STARS IF POSSIBLE
Reviews.Author: akorrr
Reviews.Content: I recieved a locked phone that i can do absolutley nothing with. Item not as described. Dont reccomend this at all! Bad.

Reviews.Title: Okay for a while
Reviews.Author: Dave
Reviews.Content: The phone was good for texting and talking but did have less signal reception than my husbands old RAZR.  then after 14 months it suddenly quit - tried a new battery but that didn't help.  Figure after a year or so it will just be a throwaway.

Reviews.Title: Loved the phone
Reviews.Author: Bea
Reviews.Content: It is easy to use. I wanted something that didn't require a lot of technical knowledge to use it.It is perfect for somebody like me that is not very knowledgable with hight tech stuff.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Elisabeth Andersen
Reviews.Content: I have had many phones over the years but this one is by far the best basic phone. It is a reliable phone with wonderful sound & clarity, easy qwerty keyboard and very durable. My son has the identical phone and it has had very heavy use. It even worked fine after being run over by a car and then ducked taped together!

Reviews.Title: Great texting phone
Reviews.Author: Mike MacInnes
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son. He didn't care for a smart phone but he does text all day. He said that he loves this phone and it is perfect for texting.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Gravity 2
Reviews.Author: Geraldine Carrillo
Reviews.Content: Very pleased, had the Gravity 1 before so this is similar. so happy. if you continue to sell them or a Gravity 3 I would probably purchase it.

Reviews.Title: Phone is just OK
Reviews.Author: Colleen Synowiecki
Reviews.Content: The phone does not have as many features as my old flip phone.  The font on the time is to small and stuck in the upper right corner, which is a big problem.  I cannot design my own home screen moving items i use most often to the front screen.The seller was great, I received the item in record time and in perfect condition.

Reviews.Title: keys unreliable
Reviews.Author: Oldtimer
Reviews.Content: We purchased this phone specifically for its qwerty keyboard, for texting purposes.  The keyboard is nice but pressing a key often gives either no response or a double response.  We returned it and purchased another type of phone.

Reviews.Title: just what i expected..and more
Reviews.Author: Sabrinamae24
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my 13yr old. Its a lil small to txt on but he still loves it. the battery life is great.

Reviews.Title: Great Used Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Anniebeeall
Reviews.Content: I simply needed a backup phone. I have a spare liine and wanted to make use of it. I noticed the regular price for the Samsung Gravity 2 cost over $200.  I purchased the used Gravity, which is in excellent condition and I am very satisfied! Thank you!
